totaalrenovatie.scopeTitle: What does a full renovation include?
totaalrenovatie.scopeDescription: A full renovation means we take care of all aspects of your home. From structural work to the smallest finishing details.
totaalrenovatie.faqSubtitle: Answers to the most common questions about full renovation.

faqs.question: How long does a full renovation take?
faqs.answer: The duration depends on the scope and complexity of your project. An average full renovation takes 3 to 6 months. We create a detailed schedule at the start.

faqs.question: Can I stay in my home during the renovation?
faqs.answer: This depends on the scope of work. We discuss this during the consultation and find the best solution together.

faqs.question: How does the payment arrangement work?
faqs.answer: We work with a payment plan in installments, linked to milestones in the project. This gives you budget certainty and transparency.

faqs.question: Do you help with subsidy applications?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide subsidy-ready quotes and invoices, and help with the necessary certificates. You submit the application yourself through the portal.

faqs.question: Do you work with subcontractors?
faqs.answer: For specialized techniques, we work with trusted partners. They work under our coordination and quality control.

aanpakPage.title: Our Approach
aanpakPage.description: From first contact to delivery: a clear process with transparent communication. So you know what to expect and won't encounter surprises.
aanpakPage.stepsSubtitle: How a project works at Nam Construction. Clear and predictable.

steps.title: Intake & Introduction
steps.description: We start with a free, no-obligation consultation. By phone, video, or at your home. We listen to your wishes, assess the situation, and discuss the possibilities.

steps.title: Proposal & Quote
steps.description: After the site visit, we prepare a detailed proposal. With clear scope, material options, and subsidy-ready quote. No surprises afterwards.

steps.title: Execution
steps.description: During execution, you're always informed. Regular updates, one point of contact, and expert work by our team and trusted partners.

steps.title: Delivery & Aftercare
steps.description: At delivery, we go through everything together. We provide the necessary certificates and guide you with subsidy applications. We're available even after delivery.

guarantees.title: Transparent pricing

aanpakPage.faqSubtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our approach.

faqs.question: How long until I receive a quote?
faqs.answer: After the site visit, you will receive a detailed quote within 1 to 2 weeks. For more complex projects, this may take a bit longer.

faqs.question: Do you work with fixed prices or post-calculation?
faqs.answer: We work with a detailed quote based on fixed prices. Additional work is always discussed and approved in advance.

faqs.question: How does communication work during the project?
faqs.answer: You have one fixed contact person. We provide regular updates (by phone, email, or WhatsApp) and are available for questions.

faqs.question: What if something goes wrong or isn't to your liking?
faqs.answer: We solve problems quickly and correctly. At delivery, we go through everything together and issues are addressed before final approval.

faqs.question: Do you help with permits?
faqs.answer: We advise on permit requirements and can refer to architects if needed. The permit application itself is outside our scope.

faqs.question: Can you also do just part of the work?
faqs.answer: Yes, we also do targeted renovations and finishing. Discuss your specific needs during the consultation.

approachSection.title: Our circular approach
approachSection.subtitle: Where technically and aesthetically possible, we reuse existing elements or carefully recover them.

steps.title: Reuse scan
steps.description: At the start, we inventory what can stay, what can be reused, and what goes to recovery.

steps.title: Selective dismantling
steps.description: Where useful, we carefully dismantle instead of brute demolition. This way materials retain their value.

steps.title: Material choice
steps.description: We advise on sustainable alternatives with attention to performance, budget and availability.

steps.title: Waste management
